mapper.select: select q_no, user_no, user_nickname, q_title, q_content, q_tag, DATE_FORMAT(q_regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %r') as q_regdate, q_recommand, q_viewcnt from question where q_no > 0 and q_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by q_regdate desc, q_no desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(q_no) from question where q_no > 0 and q_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
select * from userinfo where user_nickname like CONCAT('%',#{words},'%')

select * from userinfo where user_nickname like CONCAT('%',#{user_nickname},'%') and
user_no != #{item}

select q_no, user_no, user_nickname, q_title, q_content, q_tag, DATE_FORMAT(q_regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %r') as q_regdate, q_recommand, q_viewcnt from question where q_no > 0
and (q_tag like CONCAT('%',#{tag},'%') and q_tag not like 'javascript')
and (q_tag like CONCAT('%',#{tag},'%') or q_tag like #{tag})
order by q_regdate desc, q_no desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select count(q_no) from question where q_no > 0
and (q_tag like CONCAT('%',#{tag},'%') and q_tag not like 'javascript')
and (q_tag like CONCAT('%',#{tag},'%') or q_tag like #{tag})
